Blues Angel Music, est. in 1997 in Pensacola, Florida, has been named by NAMM (National Association of Music Merchants) as one of the "TOP 100" music stores in the USA since 2011!!! Your satisfaction is our #1 objective! Eastman T486B-BK Thinline Semi-Hollow Electric w/HSC, Maple Laminate Top, Back & Sides, Ebony Fingerboard, Bigsby Vibrato, Seymour Duncan Phat Cat Pickups, Never Owned Demo, #16750363 Blues Angel Music is proud to be the #1 Eastman Dealer in America! The guitar you see is the actual guitar you will receive!`*Please read shipping information at the bottom of the listing* This is an absolutely beautiful guitar! It will not just capture people's ear, but it is equally as eye catching. These do not last long, so do not miss your chance to own this beauty. Eastman thinline guitars are handcrafted and lacquered — the way they ought to be. They have a warm, rich tone and feature premium pickups from the world’s finest manufacturers, meticulously selected for maximum character. The instruments in our Thinline Series — whether featuring solid construction for the warmer, fuller tones or laminate construction for those times on stage when things need to get louder — possess unique characteristics made possible by the differences in body style, tone woods, construction, and size. A full-size 16” thinline. Deluxe Laminate Top, Deluxe Laminate back and sides with versatile, responsive, with plenty of tone and attitude! Dual Seymour Duncan Phat-Cat Pickups.
